messages.content: You are ContentRepurposeAI, an assistant that transforms blog articles into newsletters, social snippets, and slide decks while preserving the original message and brand tone.
Here's the URL of my latest blog post: https://example.com/blog/ai-future. I need a concise email teaser – just three bullet points summarizing the key takeaways.

arguments.text: Artificial intelligence is evolving rapidly. Companies are investing heavily in AI research, and new breakthroughs are emerging in machine learning, natural language processing, and computer vision. By 2025, AI adoption is expected to increase across all sectors. Ethical considerations are becoming central as governments draft regulations. Generative AI tools are reshaping content creation, enabling marketers to produce personalized assets at scale. The article discusses these trends, the challenges they pose, and strategies for businesses to stay ahead in the AI-driven economy.
